mapper.insert: INSERT INTO setmeal (category_id, name, price, status, description, image, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{status}, #{description}, #{image}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.update:
UPDATE setmeal
category_id = #{categoryId},
name = #{name},
price = #{price},
status = #{status},
description = #{description},
image = #{image},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_user = #{updateUser}
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM setmeal WHERE category_id = #{categoryId} AND status = 1

SELECT s.id, s.category_id, s.name, s.price, s.status, s.description, s.image, s.create_time, s.update_time, s.create_user, s.update_user, c.name AS categoryName FROM setmeal s LEFT JOIN category c ON s.category_id = c.id WHERE s.id = #{id}

SELECT s.id, s.category_id, s.name, s.price, s.status, s.description, s.image, s.update_time, c.name AS category_name, sd.id AS sd_id, sd.setmeal_id AS sd_setmeal_id, sd.dish_id AS sd_dish_id, sd.name AS sd_name, sd.price AS sd_price, sd.copies AS sd_copies FROM setmeal s LEFT JOIN category c ON s.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN setmeal_dish sd ON s.id = sd.setmeal_id WHERE s.id = #{id}
